        base_date = datetime.datetime(2016, 11, 30, 0, 0, 0)
        H = [10.4115, 10.58725, 10.095, 10.16525, 10.1475, 9.4265, 10.81575, 10.306, 10.49925, 10.042, 9.831, 11.02675, 11.414, 13.70024975, 13.99899975, 13.278, 13.50675, 14.77275025, 13.80575, 13.102, 12.5745, 12.170, 12.944, 13.13725]

            print(f"{date_str}  {value_str}")
